sys_script_include.name: EventRunning

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b8478e41db53f7009c1a622dca96190c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_dete_emb.EventRunning</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EventRunning</name><script><![CDATA[/* global GlideTableHierarchy */
/* eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars,no-implicit-globals */
var EventRunning = function(event_name,parm1){
	var i = parm1.indexOf("_list");
	var parm = (i>-1) ? parm1.substr(0,i) : parm1 ;
	var ga = new GlideTableHierarchy(parm);
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_dete_emb_sync_content_process_state');
	gr.addQuery('event_name',event_name);
	if (ga.hasExtensions())
		gr.addQuery('parm1','IN',ga.getAllExtensions().join(","));
	else 
		gr.addQuery('parm1',parm);
	gr.addQuery('complete',"false");
	gr.query();
	return gr.hasNext();
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ray.ferguson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-14 16:41:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>b8478e41db53f7009c1a622dca96190c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EventRunning</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Embedded Content" source="x_dete_emb">1b951ea1db07330098cbde82ca9619ac</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Embedded Content">1b951ea1db07330098cbde82ca9619ac</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b8478e41db53f7009c1a622dca96190c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rferguson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-07 17:33:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
